description: This file defines API route handlers for health check endpoints in a FastAPI application, including liveness and readiness probes, along with the associated response model.

classes.name: HealthResponse
classes.description: Pydantic model representing the health status response payload, including status and service identifier.

methods.name: healthz
methods.description: Asynchronous function that handles the liveness check endpoint, returning a HealthResponse with status 'ok' and service name.

methods.name: readyz
methods.description: Asynchronous function for the readiness check endpoint, returning a HealthResponse with status 'ok' and service name, with a placeholder for future DB connectivity checks.
